content: Hi <@403707149043105803> I am trying to understand how the fuzzer works a bit under the hood, am I correct that I can find it here? https://github.com/shemnon/besu/commit/a052b93b08e0dd5697bad8b2636be9e027137cda#diff-f6732d970ffefce3bc554b4ffab870e4e69ba6cd8072db6859b828c2d346de27
